ComicInfo.Summary: Something Wild: Ripclaw saves Exit who is being attacked by Ikonn. Of course, when the Newmen arrive, they believe that it was Ripclaw who beat on their teammate and a fight ensues.
ComicInfo.Title: Something Wild
